description: Strengthening National and Local Resilience to Disaster Risk in  Swaziland.

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened national capacity for integrating disaster risk reduction (DRR) & disaster risk management (DRM) tools in development planning, implementation and monitoring.
subproject.description: National capacity for effective disaster management that include the support to develop the national disaster policy, contingency plans and guidelines as well as translation of skills and competencies of the national structures and individuals. Community resilience to identified national disasters would be built in (community) profiling operationalisation of action plans.
